thread.title: TV | My Big Fat Wedding
thread.title_full: TV | My Big Fat Wedding - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | My Big Fat Wedding
text: No we haven't forgotten to leave out the word Gypsy, this is in fact just My Big Fat Wedding as it's a Channel 4 special about fat people getting married. They've thought of everything, those Channel 4 kids. It goes behind the scenes at a plus-size bridal boutique in Yorkshire where lifelong friends Lucy and Paula help brides-to-be find the perfect dress. It can sometimes be difficult for fuller figured women to find a dress they love, but the specialist store stocks gowns up to a size 32, with bespoke options going bigger. Cameras then also follow Sam as she ties the knot with Mark in Las Vegas, while Gemma wants to find a suitable dress, after her body hang-ups originally made her call it all off with her fiance Kevin.
